definition: "water" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 85), occurring in 没, 法, 流 etc/see also 三點水|三点水[san1 dian3 shui3]
copious/plentiful (of water)/surging (of waves)/refers to home village of first Han emperor 漢高祖|汉高祖[Han4 Gao1 zu3]/fig. majestic
homeless and miserable (idiom); to wander about in a desperate plight/to drift
Pei county in Xuzhou 徐州[Xu2 zhou1], Jiangsu
destitute and homeless (idiom); displaced and without means
Duke of Pei (i.e. 劉邦|刘邦[Liu2 Bang1])
see 項莊舞劍，意在沛公|项庄舞剑，意在沛公[Xiang4 Zhuang1 wu3 jian4 , yi4 zai4 Pei4 gong1]
pinyin: Xiang4 Zhuang1 wu3 jian4 , zhi4 zai4 Pei4 gong1

definition: lit. Xiang Zhuang performs the sword dance, but his mind is set on Liu Bang 劉邦|刘邦[Liu2 Bang1] (idiom); refers to 206 BC plot to murder Liu Bang, aka Duke of Pei 沛公[Pei4 gong1] and the future Han emperor, during a sword dance at Feast at Hongmen 鴻門宴|鸿门宴[Hong2 men2 Yan4]/an elaborate deception to hide malicious intent
pinyin: Xiang4 Zhuang1 wu3 jian4 , yi4 zai4 Pei4 gong1

sentences.english: The nan ning sent home, nan ning dressed in pei.

definition: to deepen (e.g. a ditch)/to extract/to manage/ladle (old)
bright/luminous/white (esp. bright white teeth of youth or white hair of old age)
Asarum/Wild ginger/also 細辛|细辛[xi4 xin1]
clear/vast and deep/classifier for a body of clear water
(of the day) long/old variant of 暢|畅[chang4]
